```{python}
#| echo: false

import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("../simulations/irm/results/irm_ate_coverage.csv", index_col=None)

display_columns = ["learner", "coverage", "ci_length"]
```


## ATE Coverage

```{python}
#| echo: false

df_ate_95 = df[df['level'] == 0.95][display_columns]

df_ate_95.style.applymap(lambda x: 'background-color : green' if x>0.9 else '', subset=["coverage"])

df_ate_95
```
